title: Someone committed suicide again????
content: People in RR campus are talking about a teacher who has committed suicide. Is that true??

comments.body: No way it's suicide. I think health problems mostly
Not sure. I don't want to make claims and rumours before the official statement comes out
No way a teacher committed suicide üôè
Yah . It was a teacher. But not sure which teacher.
If you have solid info only then post. Don't spread rumours.
guys please dont post anything without confirmation...its not right
Yes she was a great teacher and we are grieving her loss. Kindly don't spread rumours without legit info!!
yes a teacher died unfortunately. nope it was most likely not a suicide.
Yea I think something happened, cause all of the teachers in my class were really worried and they were so scared.
Locking comments until concrete and verified information is published.
